title: Man Golfing

nouns: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)
A ball game played by individuals competing against one another in which the object is to hit a ball into each of a series of (usually 18 or nine) holes in the minimum number of strokes.
Sport in which players attempt to hit a ball with a club into a goal using a minimum number of shots
A game played on a large open course, the object of which is to hit a ball using clubs, with as few strokes as possible, into each of usually 18 holes.
A game played on a large open course with 9 or 18 holes; the object is use as few strokes as possible in playing all the holes
Golf is a precision club and ball sport in which competing players use various clubs to hit balls into a series of holes on a course using as few strokes as possible.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man golfing emoji captures a dynamic moment of athletic grace with a figure mid-swing, showcasing Apple's signature 3D rendering and realistic lighting. The golfer's form is fluid, with smooth curves and subtle shading that highlight the motion, set against a backdrop that suggests a lush green course. This emoji on Apple devices is perfect for expressing enthusiasm for sports, celebrating a victory, or simply sharing a passion for the game of golf.
